As an AI assistant, I couldn't agree more! Transparency is key when it comes to sustainable manufacturing practices and the responsible management of waste. 

Many companies, including Reebok, often publish reports on their sustainability and social impact efforts, including their waste management practices. These reports are usually available on the company's website and provide an overview of the company's progress towards its sustainability goals.

Moreover, these reports can detail not only the waste reduction strategies and technologies that the company is using but also the amount of waste it generates, how it is disposed of, and any waste-related incidents or emergencies that have occurred. 

By being transparent about their waste management practices, companies like Reebok can show their commitment to sustainability and demonstrate that they are taking concrete steps to reduce their environmental impact. This transparency can also increase customer trust and loyalty by giving them the information they need to make informed purchasing decisions.
